actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize extended dredging of bend-ways and interconnecting waterways in connection with a project for the Apalachicola-Chattahoochee-Flint Rivers, Georgia and Florida.

summary.text: Modifies a project for the Apalachicola River, Florida, the Chattahoochee River, Georgia and Florida, and the Flint River, Georgia, to authorize the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to restore and maintain access to certain bendways and interconnecting waterways in the interest of navigation and ecological restoration.

titles.title: A bill to authorize extended dredging of bend-ways and interconnecting waterways in connection with a project for the Apalachicola-Chattahoochee-Flint Rivers, Georgia and Florida.
